content.query:
select top 10 * from dbGestao..vwClientes

select count(*) from dbGestao..vwClientes

select top 10 SUBSTRING(dtCadastro,4,2),*  from dbGestao..vwClientes

select SUBSTRING(dtCadastro,7,4)+SUBSTRING(dtCadastro,4,2),count(*)
  from dbGestao..vwClientes
group by SUBSTRING(dtCadastro,7,4)+SUBSTRING(dtCadastro,4,2)

select upper(trim(nome)),count(*)
  from dbGestao..vwClientes
group by upper(trim(nome))
having count(*) >1


select nome,count(*)
  from dbGestao..vwClientes
group by nome 
having count(*) > 1
